original_title: Clifford's Puppy Days: Helping Paws / Puppy Playtime
overview: Talk about going to the dogs! Everyone's favorite fire engine red puppy, Clifford, is back in a series of fun new adventures. In "Helping Paws," Clifford proves that although he's kind of little, he can be a big help to his friends. In "Puppy Play Time," the pooch discovers that via imagination, sharing and friendship, you don't always need a toy to have fun during playtime.
title: Clifford's Puppy Days: Helping Paws / Puppy Playtime
